Production Co: Alpine Pictures Inc., Box Office Productions LLC
Rating: R (Pervasive Drug & Alcohol Abuse|All Involving Teens|Language|An Act of Violence|Sexual Content)
Synopsis: Jonah, a teenage nerd, develops a crush on Sara, a pretty classmate. Sara, who is already dating Troy, invites Jonah to join her exclusive clique. Her friends are not pleased but soon change their minds after they learn that Jonah works at a pharmacy and can keep them supplied with drugs. Tragedy looms as the teens' love triangle and hard-partying ways escalate.
Title: Love Is the Drug
